title: Bug 3970 - UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files
description: Bug 3970 - The Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PCs are cheaper than Unix boxes). Currently, when a new file is created on Windows, it does not have Unix line delimiters, which is problematic because the end product is a Unix product. There should be a UI (Preference) available to define the line delimiter for new files. The possible values should include Dos/Windows, Mac, Unix, and the default platform line delimiter. This UI should be provided by the Workbench to ensure consistency in the line delimiter usage across all plugins. Notes:
EB: Even if the new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix line delimiters since the end product is a Unix product.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow this scenario: Use both Unix and Windows workstations to develop a Unix product/program.
